name: protector
effect: Held by Rhydon: Evolves the holder into Rhyperior when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Rhydon: Holder evolves into Rhyperior.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
